About the Company: Bajaj Electricals Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of appliances like water heaters, mixers, micro ovens, room air coolers, irons, room heaters, gas stoves and electric kettles, a wide range of electric fans,lightings like lamps, torches, tubes and wide range of luminaries and engineering and projects. In order to expand its product portfolio the company has tie up with Nardi Elettrodomestici SpA of Italy for Gas Appliances, Securition of Switzerland for fire alarms and Security Products and Delta Controls of Canada for BMS and HVAC..The company also engagged in the business of Lighting, Consumer Durables, Engineering & Projects.
